def solve(r, b, l):
    if b == 0:
        if r == 0 and l >= 0:
            return 1
        return 0
    if l < 0 or r < 0:
        return 0
    if arr[r][b][l] != -1:
        return arr[r][b][l]
    ans = 0
    ans += solve(r - 0, b - 1, l)
    ans %= mod
    ans += solve(r - 0, b - 1, l - 1)
    ans %= mod
    ans += solve(r - 4, b - 1, l)
    ans %= mod
    ans += solve(r - 6, b - 1, l)
    ans %= mod
    arr[r][b][l] = ans
    return ans
mod = int(1000000000.0 + 7)
arr = [[[-1 for k in range(10)] for j in range(301)] for i in range(1801)]
for _ in range(int(input())):
    (r, b, l) = map(int, input().split())
    if r > 1800 or r & 1:
        print(0)
    else:
        print(solve(r, b, l))
